name: Dungeons: The Challenge of Aphrorya ATT 11/11/2017
name_original: Dungeons: The Challenge of Aphrorya ATT 11/11/2017
description:
In this game, you are Ryuuji and will have the quest to defeat 6 dungeons around the world and defeat Aphrorya, the god of your planet. Be a challenger and prove to everyone that YOU CAN be a GOD too!

Please, coment your opinion to this game!!!
